
# Function


## ```js extension ```


Return the passed file path extension

## Parameters

- **path**  String: The file path to get the extension from



## Example (js)

```js
const extension = require('@coffeekraken/sugar/node/fs/extension');
extension('hello/world.jpg'); // => jpg
```
